title: Escaping Reality: An Incredible Story, of Love, Loss and Redemption
description: Little Alma Jennings dreams of fitting in. Having travelled from one side of the world to the other, she desperately wants to feel normal. Then, one day, a dark encounter changes everything.Escaping Reality is a true coming-of-age story. From backstabbing friends to love rat squaddies, teenage heartbreak to parties gone wrong, Alma’s journey will take you on an emotional rollercoaster. Far from home, and beset by personal demons, Alma must rebuild her life – one step at a time. Follow Alma as she battles a terrifying addiction, and stumbles upon a secret that could threaten the very fabric of her existence. Will Alma overcome the demon drink, or will it consume her?A story that will resonate with any person growing up on foreign soil, or anyone who has battled with addiction, Escaping Reality is an intense, thoughtful, and heartbreaking novel. Using some real-life events, Lucy Wade has crafted a thrilling and emotional story, that truly captures the essence of teenage anguish.
author: Lucy Wade
